contextvoting 0.0.0.1
  • Reference

All One Stage Simulation in Action

oneset.Rd

Conducting one stage of election.

oneset(alike_threshold = 0.2, segregation_radius = 1,
  signalbias_mean = 0.2, signalbias_sd = 0.2, signalbias_size = NULL,
  signalbias_ingroup = 0.5, signaldifficulty = 3,
  updatecommonfactor_sd = 0.1, updatecommonfactor_mean = 0,
  updategroupfactor_sd = 0, updategroupfactor_mean = 0,
  updatepersonalfactor_sd = 0, updatepersonalfactor_mean = 0,
  partyloc_noise = 0, partycapacity_noise = 0.5,
  partyblue_loc_direction = 0, partyred_loc_direction = 0,
  partycapacity_direction_mean = 0, partyupdate_type = "oneshot",
  context_type = "region", contextradius = 5, contexttimetoagg = 2,
  b_idedist = 0.198, b_capacity = 0.716, b_incumbent = 1.526,
  b_pvi_nation = -9.827, b_pvi_local = 5.156, b_pvi_sublocal = 1.663,
  b_pid = 1.215, maxt_segregation = 50, n_elections = 30,
  n_drop_elections = 5, n_voters = 2300, spacelim = c(54, 54),
  sizegroup = c(0.5, 0.5), regionlevel = c(3, 3),
  subregionlevel = c(9, 9), startcommonfactor = NULL,
  startgroupfactor = 0.8, startpersonalfactor = 1,
  groupfactor_type = "constant", knowmean1 = 0.65, knowmean2 = 0.65,
  knowspread = 0.85, partyblue_startloc = -0.8,
  partyred_startloc = 0.8, partystartloc_noise = 0,
  partyblue_startcapacity = 0, partyred_startcapacity = 0,
  partystartcapacity_noise = 0.5, burnin_redvoteprob_sd = 0.05,
  burnin_redvoteprob_cor = 0.19, seedval = NULL, drawplot = FALSE,
  run_type = "all", segregated_soc = NULL)

Arguments

alike_threshold

1 - tolerance in the segregation game. The default = 0.2;
segregation_radius

Search radius to look for neightbors The default = 1; 8 people around
signalbias_mean

The average common directional bias (i.e., positive value advantages red party and vice versa) in signal. The default is 0.5.
signalbias_sd

The SD common directional bias. The bias is drawn from normal distribution each time. The default is 0.5.
signalbias_size

The extent of fixed common directional bias. If assigned; mean and sd arguments above will be ignored.
signalbias_ingroup

The extent of fixed common ingroup bias (i.e., Evaluate the ingroup candidate better). The default is 0.
signaldifficulty

The extent of noise level in signal. Given the default values of knowledge, ideology, and party position, the default difficulty of 3 produces idedist with SD 1.9; Consistent with ANES.
updatecommonfactor_sd

The movement in common factor. SD. The default is 0.1.
updatecommonfactor_mean

The movement in common factor. Mean. The default is 0.
updategroupfactor_sd

The movement in group influence on ideology. SD. The default is 0.
updategroupfactor_mean

The movement in group influence on ideology. Mean. The default is 0.
updatepersonalfactor_sd

The SD for the movemebnt in personal influence on ideology. SD. The default is 0.
updatepersonalfactor_mean

The SD for the movemebnt in personal influence on ideology. Mean. The default is 0.
partyloc_noise

Random noise in updating locations of party ideologies. The default is 0.
partycapacity_noise

Random noise in updating party capacity. The default is 0.5. The average score in ANES is 0.7 but it produces too much movement in voting.
partyblue_loc_direction

Direction and expected quantity of the movement in blue party ideology.
partyred_loc_direction

Direction and expected quantity of the movement in red party ideology.
partycapacity_direction_mean

The average direction and expected quantity of the movement in party capacity. (Positive vaue advantages red party and negative value advantages blue party).
partyupdate_type

The type of updating procedure. If "oneshot", the update is always given over startloc and startcapacity defined in setparty at each election. If "online", the update is given over the ideology and capacity realized in the previous election. If "fromstart" the update is given over the ideology and capacity realized in the first election of the simulation run.
context_type

"region" (default) or "network" (currently not used).
contextradius

Radius to seach neighbors. Only applied when context_type=="network" (currently not used).
contexttimetoagg

How many previous elections to average. Either 1 or 2 (default).
b_idedist

The influence of ideological distance. The default = 0.198, from ANES.
b_capacity

The influence of capacity The default = 0.716, from ANES.
b_incumbent

The influence if incumebent. The default = 1.526, from ANES (EDV result).
b_pvi_nation

The influence of national PVI. The default = -9.827, from ANES (EDV result).
b_pvi_local

The influence of regional PVI. The default = 5.156, from CCES pvi_state.
b_pvi_sublocal

The influence of sub-regional PVI. The default = 1.663, from CCES pvi_state.
b_pid

The influence of group membership. The default = 1.215, from ANES.
maxt_segregation

Max time of movement in the segregation game. The default is 50.
n_elections

Number of elections in each simulation run. The default is 30.
n_drop_elections

Number of first N elections dropped from the quality assessment. The default is 5.
n_voters

Interger. Number of agents. The default is 2300.
spacelim

Integer vector of length 2. Grid space size (number of rows and number of columns, respectively). The default is c(54,54).
sizegroup

Numeric Vector. Proportion of agents in each group. Length defines the number of groups. Must adds up to 1. The default is c(0.5,0.5).
regionlevel

Integer vector of length 2. Level to Split Region (Horizontaly & Vertically). The default is c(3,3).
subregionlevel

Ingeger vector of length 2. Level to Split Sub-Region (Horizontaly & Vertically). The default is c(9,9).
startcommonfactor

The starting value of The common factor in ideology (intercept). The default is NULL (draw randomly).
startgroupfactor

The starting value of the group influence on ideology. The default is 0.8 (from ANES, skewed slightly towards right in the reality).
startpersonalfactor

The starting value of the random personal factor in ideology (The SD of the random error to the model). The defauls is 1 (to get ideology distribution with SD 1, from ANES).
groupfactor_type

If "constant", groupfactor is the constant coefficient for group. If "diverging", groupfactor is the SD for folded normal distribution that randomly assigns coeffcient for group.
knowmean1

The lowest average level of knowledge for Group Blue/-1. 0.65 is the overall mean in ANES (stable).
knowmean2

The highest average level of knowledge for Group Red/1. 0.65 is the overall mean in ANES (stable).
knowspread

The spread (SD for normal distribution) of knowledg within a group. The default is 0.85 (To get approx 0.25 SD after conversion, referred to ANES).
partyblue_startloc

Starting location of blue party ideology. The default is -0.8 (from ANES).
partyred_startloc

Starting location of red party ideology. The default is 0.8 (from ANES).
partystartloc_noise

Random noise given to the starting locations of party ideologies. The default is 0.
partyblue_startcapacity

Starting level of blue party capacity. The default is 0.
partyred_startcapacity

Starting level of red party capacity. The default is 0.
partystartcapacity_noise

Random noise given to the starting level of party capacities. The default is 0.5.
burnin_redvoteprob_sd

The spread for the "burn-in" period (i.e., first two elections) voting behaviors. The default is 0.05, referred to SD in ANES National PVI. See details.
burnin_redvoteprob_cor

The correlation between voting and group in "burn-in" period voting behaviors. the default is 0.19. referred to ANES. See details.
seedval

The random number seed.
drawplot

If True; draw plots of results
run_type

The default is "all" (to run both segregation and election models) Can also be "segregation" or "election" (which runs only one of them).
segregated_soc

The pre-defined society object. If not NULL and run_type == "election", predefined society is used in simulation.

Value

List object with society characteristics, including following elements:

  • grid The grid of voters (with group membership at each cell)

  • grid_region The grid of region identifier at each cell.

  • grid_subregion The grid of sub-region identifier at each cell.

  • grid_coords All grid coordinates.

  • group The numeric vector of group memberships

  • region_stat Aggregated group statistics by region.

  • subregion_stat Aggregated group statistics by region.

  • grid_votes2 The grid of voting decisions in t-2 election.

  • grid_votes1 The grid of voting decisions in t-1 election.

  • ideology Created by setideology, may be updated by updateideology

  • knowledge Created by setknowledge

  • context Created by getregion

  • signal Created by getsignal

  • incumbent Character of incumbent party. Either "blue" or "red".

  • votes Created by letsvote

  • quality Aggregated quality of decisions.

Details

In the first two elections, the model does not have the sufficient number of previous elections to aggregate. If the society does not cotain the information of two previous elections, the hypothetical votes in first two election is radomly provided by the following procedure.

  • Draw the reference value of voting for red for each group of voters by multi-variate normal distribution with mean 0 and the covariance with group membership (i.e., -1, or 1) set by burnin_redvoteprob_cor.

  • Multiply the reference values by burnin_redvoteprob_sd and add 0.5 to generate the probability of red vote for each group.

  • Draw vote of voters in each group by the Bernouli distribution with probability drawin in the previous step.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
